Instructions:
1. Select the line in error.
2. Go to 'Actions' > 'Get Cost'.
3. Refresh and wait for cost to populate.
4. Click 'Book' to finalize.
Rationale: Fixes 'Line does not have Buy Price Basis' alert.

Instructions:
1. Search WEB-SO in Navision mailbox.
2. Open order confirmation PDF.
3. Note Carrier & Account Number.
4. In Unity > Line Item Details > Shipping: Select matching Carrier and enter Account.
Rationale: Ensures billing accuracy for customer carrier accounts.

Instructions:
Step 1: Email delink_and_rematch_invoices@arrow.com.
Step 2: Provide SO# and reason (e.g. 'Received 5 instead of 10').
Step 3: Wait for confirmation.
Step 4: Process amendment in Unity.
Step 5: Notify team once amendment is done.
Rationale: Allows changes to orders that are already 'Billed'.

Instructions:
1. Create new SO with original info.
2. Set MFR to include 3rd party (e.g. MOLEX_WAL).
3. Set Resale to $0.00.
4. Remove all Freight charges.
5. Book and immediately place on 'Manual Header Hold'.
6. After 30 mins, find PO# in SWB (Info > Drop Ship).
Rationale: Ensures supplier payment without double-billing customer.

Instructions: Email AP the new PO# (Subject: 'Dropship Order D000... - Please confirm receipt').\nInclude Invoice # and CC Sophia Ciarlo.
Rationale: Confirms AP can match receipt to enable supplier payment.

Instructions:
1. Check if SO is in 'Released' or 'Picked' for >2 days.
2. In ETQ, select 'Sure Ship Domestic - Draft'.
3. Fill in mandatory fields and SO info.
4. Select Host 'AC Prod'.
Rationale: Expedites stalled orders at the Reno warehouse.

Instructions: 1. For items in 'Awaiting Receipt' >3 days.\n2. Select 'Receiving Expedite - Draft' in ETQ.\n3. Provide 'Signed By' info if available.
Rationale: Prioritizes goods-in processing at the facility.

Instructions:
1. Raise 'Digital Issue' ticket in My Connect.
2. Provide Warehouse info & SO.
3. Request to 'Drop New DID'.
4. Delete old backorder alert after IT confirms fix.
Rationale: Fixes orders stuck in 'Released' status due to software lag.
